subject: Re: SEO Keyword Research Smart Referral
preview: hi @heath i used the inspect element on this page, Find Specialists is already H1

full_threads.body: hi @heath i used the inspect element on this page, Find Specialists is already H1

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

I have just rechecked the find a specialist page: https://smartreferral.com.au/find-a-specialist/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/find-a-specialist/>

But there still isn't H1.

Can the H1 please be updated to:
Find Specialists
Thanks
Brittany


From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Monday, 31 August 2020 6:07 PM
To: Brittany Grimble <brittany@practiceedge.com.au <mailto:brittany@practiceedge.com.au>>
Subject: Re: SEO Keyword Research Smart Referral

Great, thanks Brittany!

Re the master pages for hospitals and clinics, yes, they exist, but are buried for now as we are yet to jazz them up.

I will get them over to you ASAP though.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300 072 134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415 162 271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
<https://wpperk.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Signature&utm_campaign=WolfIQ> <https://wolfiq.com.au/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Signature&utm_campaign=WolfIQ>

> On 31 Aug 2020, at 5:08 pm, Brittany Grimble <brittany@practiceedge.com.au <mailto:brittany@practiceedge.com.au>> wrote:
>
> Hey Heath,
>
> Just wanted to touch base and let you know all the published specialist profile pages have now been finalised for SEO set up.
>
> So to date all clinic, hospital, specialist profile pages and parts of the specialist category pages have been finished.
>
> Just a question did you have a similar master list/page for the clinics and hospitals like you do for the specialist categories?
>
> Thanks
> Brittany
>
> <Outlook-0pyydqxe.jpg>

>

> Thanks

>> On 24 Aug 2020, at 5:03 pm, Brittany Grimble <brittany@practiceedge.com.au <mailto:brittany@practiceedge.com.au>> wrote:
>>
>> Thanks Heath I will go through it.
>>
>> Also just wanted to let you know thus far I have finalised the SEO on all your hospital and clinic profiles uploaded onto the website.
>>
>> Please find below further page revision suggestions:
>>
>> https://smartreferral.com.au/submit-a-referral/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/submit-a-referral/>
>> Currently the page doesn't have a H1. Can the Submit a Referral h2 please be updated to a H1.
>
> *Done
>> https://smartreferral.com.au/find-a-specialist/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/find-a-specialist/>
>> Currently the page doesn't have a h1, can the Find Specialists please be updated as page h1
> *Done
>>
>> Find Specialists
>
>> https://smartreferral.com.au/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/>
>> Currently the page h1 is: Here's how it works. Can this please be updated to Find a Medical Specialist or Surgeon Online
> *Done
>> I have added anchors to the submit a referral and find specialist page within the intro paragraph - these have defaulted to the magenta colour. Would you like them changed?
> *All good
>
>> DUPLICATE TITLES & DESCRIPTIONS:
>> Currently across the website there is duplicate titles and descriptions from rankmath meta property (see example below). Duplicate titles and descriptions are being presented in the page source.
>>
>> <!-- Search Engine Optimization by Rank Math - https://s.rankmath.com/home <https://s.rankmath.com/home> -->
>> <title>Find A Medical Specialist, Doctor Or Surgeon Online In Sydney</title>
>> <meta name="description" content="Are you looking to find a doctor or surgeon in Sydney? Smart Referral is Australia's online comprehensive doctor & healthcare specialist directory helping patients to find the best medical specialists and surgeons across Sydney."/>
>> <meta name="robots" content="follow, index, max-snippet:-1, max-video-preview:-1, max-image-preview:large"/>
>> <link rel="canonical" href="https://smartreferral.com.au/find-a-specialist/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/find-a-specialist/>" />
>> <meta property="og:locale" content="en_US">
>> <meta property="og:type" content="article">
>> <meta property="og:title" content="Find A Medical Specialist, Doctor Or Surgeon Online In Sydney">
>>
>>
>> <meta property="og:description" content="Are you looking to find a doctor or surgeon in Sydney? Smart Referral is Australia's online comprehensive doctor & healthcare specialist directory helping patients to find the best medical specialists and surgeons across Sydney.
>>
>> Are these duplicates? Looks like they are Open Graph (OG) entries? Is that ok?
>>
>> Thanks
>> Brittany
>>
>> <Outlook-3k5dsma2.jpg>

>>> On 20 Aug 2020, at 4:50 pm, Brittany Grimble <brittany@practiceedge.com.au <mailto:brittany@practiceedge.com.au>> wrote:
>>>
>>> Hey Heath,
>>> We report on them monthly - you will also have access to a live dashboard with results (will be set up once we finalise conversion tracking etc).
>>>
>>> Specialist Optimisation:
>>> I have noticed there have been some page titles and descriptions put together for Jinny Foo:
>>> <title>Dr Jinny Foo - Obstetrics and Gynaecology Specialist Sydney</title>
>>> <meta name="description" content="Dr Jinny Foo, a specialist in Obstetrics and Gynaecology, has expertise in: Fertility, Paediatric Adolescent Gynaecology and Pregnancy. Learn more!"/>
>>>
>>> Am I able to update and amend as needed?
>>> *Yes of course*
>>
>>
>>> On that note I also have a few questions regarding conversion tracking:
>>> SUBMIT A REFERRAL: https://smartreferral.com.au/submit-a-referral/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/submit-a-referral/>
>>> Screen notification: Thanks for submitting your details. We will let you know when this new feature is available. Can this be set up as a thank you page load instead?
>> Sure, done: https://smartreferral.com.au/submit-a-referral/ty/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/submit-a-referral/ty/>
>>> SEARCH FUNCTIONALITY: https://smartreferral.com.au/find-a-specialist/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/find-a-specialist/>
>>> Are you currently gathering or tracking any of the internal site searches that are taking place? So we can identify trends or commonalities?
>> *I have just setup this data to store in GA, here is the link: https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/?authuser=2#/report/content-site-search-overview/a170037599w236822294p221572084/ <https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/?authuser=2#/report/content-site-search-overview/a170037599w236822294p221572084/> Hopefully it’s useful, let’s see.
>>
>>>
>>> SPECIALIST FORM SUBMISSIONS: I have filled in the required sections below but it is saying there is a problem with my submission. Is there a way we can also set up a universal thank you page for all specialist submissions for conversion tracking.
>> Sure, done: https://smartreferral.com.au/message-received-ty/ <https://smartreferral.com.au/message-received-ty/>
>>> <Screen Shot 2020-08-20 at 4.28.55 pm.png>
>>>
>>> Thanks
>>> Brittany
>>>
